name: Yusuf Za'arur
description: '''Yusuf Za'arur''' ({{Langx|ar|يوسف زعرور}}; {{Langx|he|יוסף זערור}}; 1902 – November 14, 1969) was a world-renowned [[History of the Jews in Iraq|Iraqi-Jewish]] ''[[Qanun (instrument)|qanun]]'' player and director of Radio Orchestra of [[Baghdad]] during the 1930s.
